entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
